pr_title: [KEYCLOAK-14335] - Not initializing entity associations and removing bi-directional ones

timeline.message: [KEYCLOAK-14335] - Not initializing entity associations and removing bi-directional ones
[KEYCLOAK-14335] - Not initializing entity associations and removing bi-directional ones

timeline.body:
```suggestion
        realm.setMasterAdminClient(client.getId());
```

I don't think we need to lookup the client here, nor do we need an em.flush here.
timeline.bodyHTML:
Suggested change
String appEntityId = client !=null ? em.getReference(ClientEntity.class, client.getId()).getId() : null;
realm.setMasterAdminClient(appEntityId);
em.flush();
realm.setMasterAdminClient(client.getId());

I don't think we need to lookup the client here, nor do we need an em.flush here.
timeline.author: stianst
